detail.description: Brigade Enterprises Ltd was established in 1986. It is a real estate developer in South India, based in Bengaluru, and expanding its area of operations in other parts of India. It has completed over 250 buildings aggregating to over 70 mn. sqft of developed space in residential, offices, retail, and hospitality sectors across Bengaluru and Mysuru, Chennai, Ahmedabad, Hyderabad, Kochi [1] [2] [3]
